content.detailedDescription: Around ten till eleven at night central time.  traveling south on meridian road north of state rd 6 i saw a very bright red orb in the sky.  it was stationary.  i went east on 900 north to get to my house.  i got out of the car and walked down the street to see if it was still there.  it was still hovering and there was another red orb underneath it.  i looked over to the west and saw another red orb hovering.  the two orbs to the south at about the same time dimmed.  the started moving south and started blinking.  i looked over to the orb in the east.  it looked like it was moving towards me to the east.  it went dark and into the clouds.  it did not come out of the clouds and must have reversed direction.  the cloud cover was half clouds to the west and all clear on the east.  bindery was north south.  as the two red orbs blinked out they moved south then looked like planes leaving the area.  i am a sky watcher we live on the midway airport flight path.  i am use to planes looking very bright as they are miles out coming in.  the size and the bright color of red they were lead me to believe they were not planes.  when they all three dimmed out at the same time i thought maybe they were planes.  i was wanting to see if anyone else saw.
content.summary: Bright red stationary light

content.detailedDescription:
One night a neighbor of mine called and said to get outside and look in the direction of her house. she said there was a ufo above her house and it had been there for a couple of hours. unsure of what i was seeing, i went to her house to see it for myself. sure enough, there was something in the sky that appeared to be spinning on an axis, very quickly, and had multi-colored lights that were not normally seen in the sky. her father, who was in the air force for 30+ years, said he had never seen anything like it and was quite convinced it was a ufo. i went back home and looked in the direction of her house and sure enough, i could see it from my yard. the next night, i went out around sunset and as soon as the sun went down, there it was: in the same spot, hovering and spinning. being a photographer, i ran inside, grabbed my camera and tripod, set it up and started taking photos. i did long exposures so i would know if it was moving in a weird pattern or not based on the star trails around it. sure enough, the object was all over the place in comparison to the star trails. then i decide to record the object. i put the largest lens i had on my camera (not ideal but it did the job) and focused as best i could on the object, which mind you was far enough away that it looked like a large star, and hit record. 
the object appeared in the same spot multiple nights in a row and it actually slowly, but surely, descended below the tree line. by 9:30pm-10pm i couldn't see it anymore but without fail it was there the next night. this went on for about a month or so and then it just stopped. since then, i have seen weird lights in the sky around my house but nothing as constant and bright as the one i saw in october of 2014.
content.summary: Object appeared to have multiple colored lights; witnessed multiple nights in same location

content.detailedDescription: Indianapolis, in. i was on the back patio having a cigarette around 11 p.M. out of the corner of my eye towards the east, a bright shiny object caught my attention. at first i thought it was a plane, but the glow from the object was just as bright as burning mercury. i saw no flashing markers to identify it as a plane, so i got the attention of my fiancee and she came outside and witnessed with me what happened next. the object appeared to descend a little and decrease its speed and was heading in a  north, north-eastern direction. at that time two more objects came into view of which where appearing as if they were burning a red-orange color and fell behind the first object creating a triangle formation. seconds later the two objects changed color from yellow to a bright white like the first. at that point the objects seemed to cruise over the city maintaining altitude and formation. a few seconds later two of the objects just disappeared and the other one accelerated and ascended out of view. i didn't know who to turn to or to call for this matter. so, i found this website and wanted to post this to see if anyone else witnessed this as well.
content.summary: Witnessed three objects descend elevation and speed, two where bright orange red which changed to a burning white like the other

content.detailedDescription: At the time i witnessed this i was stood in my kitchen waiting for the kettle to boil. my house is in a elevated position and looking out of my kitchen window which faces sw,  i have a good view of the sky above. living in warminster which is a military town, im used to seeing aircraft during the day, and lights in the sky at night, which most of the time ive attributed to normal aircraft, although in the past ive seen a few lights that ive thought to be a little different. on this particular evening it was a reasonably clear night and visibilty was good. i noticed two sets of lights come into view as they rose above the tree tops about a half mile away. usually on aircraft that ive seen at night, there are two sometimes three lights on the craft, these had more and were much brighter than id expect to see. they seemed to almost touch before seperating and remaing close, they then followed a circular anti clockwise flight plan keeping just above tree level and headed towards a radio/tv mast with a flashing red beacon on top se from my position. i grabbed my phone and ran upstairs to my bedroom which has two velox windows which face the same direction as my kitchens, opened them amd watched the craft(s) as it slowly made its way towards the area of the beacon. the first thing i noticed that was odd, was the fact i couldnt hear any noise, at most a slight hum, usually as sound travels better at night if i see lights overhead i can hear the engines. having spent 8 years in the army and been around miltary aircraft including helicopters, i know what to expect so this was obviously strange. as the craft circuled the beacon the lights changed to a glowing white orb like shape and started to release something out of the bottom of it, as if it was dumping something, but it didnt look to be in trouble. that lasted for about 30 seconds then it changed back to the lights again and did another anti clockwise sweep around the area before it made off in a easterly direction and i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Strange lights  observed then craft(s) followed a circular flight plan above radio/tv transmitter before discharging something

the area before it made off in a easterly direction and i lost sight of it.

content.detailedDescription:
Good evening everyone , just a brief account doque saw today on 09.08.2015 about 19:00 in ribeirao preto sp , was in the backyard of my house and three luminous objects called attention because they were forming a perfect triangle and one of them was not as bright as the other two, for about 10 seconds , heading north , they moved slowly , and as they moved parallel to the horizon , this did not seem far away, but in approximately 10 seconds were decreasing intensity and keeping the formation disappeared .

i make this account in an attempt to find out if there were more witnesses to this fact ...

big hug to all
content.summary: Forming a perfect triangle and one of them was not as bright as the other two, for about 10 seconds , heading north , they moved slowly , and as they moved parallel to the horizon , this did not seem far away

content.detailedDescription:
Smoke trail is obvious, dropping threw cloud from a cloaked donut is not, visual variations are present & detectable, mother ship below looks like hollywood hoax. none the less in the picture. 
as i drove northward smoke broke down & was less dominant, the blackness caught my eye, but the picture caught my attention. i drove home not knowing what the cell phone camera had captured.
content.summary: Two objects, 3rd had departed, left hole in clouds & smoke trail. 1 transparent, 1cartoonish in cloud

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday august 8th, 2015  
9:45pm  draper utah
i saw intense point of purple light coming from (what looked like) a spot on the mountains you can see from my back porch. i asked my wife what she thought it was, (people do live on the mountain and you can sometimes see car headlights shine). at first i thought it was someone with incredible bright purple headlights parked on the mountain. but it started to move around, and never became dim or flickered like headlights do. we were both starting to wonder what it was when it lifted above the mountain line, and into the sky.

it stayed perfectly still for long periods of time, and drifted back and forth, sometimes for far distances and sometimes just a little very slowly. 

all the streetlights, and house lights on the mountain were easy to focus on, but for some reason it remained blurry even when we strained to see it. it looked out of focus to both of us,(only i wear glasses), like we were looking at it through watery eyes.

after floating for 5-6 minutes, it slowly lowered, and we lost sight of it behind some distant trees.

we went driving to see if we could find anything, and we did see some very bright flashes at 2 points, but could not find the object, or any trace of anything out of the ordinary.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Intense point of purple light. hovered, changed direction, slowly landed.

content.detailedDescription: while i was driving to work northbound on the 91 freeway at 1:23 pm here in riverside california,  i noticed in the sky what seemed to be a small silver aircraft not moving fast at all.  i then saw two seperate witnesses in two different cars pointing in the sky at this object.  i then noticed  that this object didn't seem to have wings. the more i stared the more i realized it did not have wings and that this thing looked like a .50 caliber bullet.  within seconds of my observation this thing emitted two flashes back to back about a second apart then vanished. i'd say 5 seconds later another flash emitted from what looked like behind the blue sky!  i have seen some crazy activity in the sky at night but never in the day and never so clearly.  i am now sitting at work very confounded on what i was looking at.  unfortunately,  i don't think i will ever know what it was i was looking at.  i really hope others too will report this as this was over a high traffic area.
content.summary: Bullet shaped object that slowly moved through the sky slowly, then flashed twice, disappeared, then flashed again while object was not visible.

content.detailedDescription: My 13 year old daughter and i were driving home from my sister's house around 10:20 p.M. when we both let out gasps.  it seemed that a plane fell out of the sky. we were both quite upset.  i was a little perplexed as to why i didn't hear a crash or see smoke but thought maybe it was farther away than it appeared.  i have been checking the news and internet up until now for an explanation of what we saw but nothing.  no plane crashes, (their are meteor showers occurring right now but it was not that- no trail of light/debris, it was not a naturally occurring type light either), no falling satellites reported.  my daughter and i were certain we just witnessed a plane falling from the sky but again, no plane crashes reported in the area.  it happened very quickly and it fell from the sky in an ark like angle and then disappeared behind the tree/house line.  it looked as if it was less than a mile away, possibly within a few blocks where we were from but hard to tell because all we could see was essentially a blue falling light.  my daughter said that in addition to the blue light (which remained solid in color and was a bright vibrant blue color) she saw flashing white and red lights which made her believe it was a plane that was falling.  i believed it was a plane because the light i was seeing was not a natural light (it wasn't the type of light you see with a shooting star, a falling star, or a meteor and the way and speed it was falling was also different) it was more like a light you would on a plane.  i was very, very surprised when i found no reports of a plane crash or anything else that could explain what we saw. it looks like it will remain a mystery!
content.summary: Blue light fell from sky- looked like airplane falling out of sky but no crashes reported

content.detailedDescription:
Our area had a severe "straight line wind" storm causing extensive outages and damage.  the evening sunset was pretty so i went out on the deck and took a picture, "the calm after the storm", with my phone.  later when i looked at the picture i noticed a yellow ball.  when i zoomed in on the picture it was solid yellow with scattered white balls,five visible.  the base of the sphere is covered by clouds but you can see the sphere through the clouds. the people i have shown it to all think it is a ufo.

over the years i have seen low white balls, one at a time, around the lakes and bays.  i have had one for sure ufo siting in 1974.  

i have never reported anything like this and am always hesitant to share these kinds of things, but this looks to unbelievable.
content.summary: After a huge storm i took a picture of the sunset, over grand traverse bay, with my phone.  the next day when i looked at the picture there was a yellow ball over the peninsula, partially covered by clouds.  when i zoom in it is a yellow sphere with white

content.detailedDescription:
Was vacationing with a friend in british columbia. she drove on an isolated road where she knew of a natural hot spring. the road is high up in the mountains.It took approx. 15-20 minutes to get to the natural hot springs. we had entered the road from the main trans canada highway, since we were vacationing in radium hotsprings.

i took a few pictures of the area once we arrived. we were both amazed at the natural beauty of the scenery. i'd say that the trees were surrounding the area and we were in the middle of the mountainous area. the road has been used quite a bit to get to a smaller community further down the road.     

we felt a heavy presence watching us after being there for about 5 minutes, we both felt alerted to the presence. we also assumed it could possibly an animal. we waited for about 5 minutes looking around wondering if there was a type of bear or cougars around. but we did not hear anything moving in the bushes near by. 

we felt a bit uneasy but okay at the same time like it was not threatening but of course being in the middle of the mountains you have to be on alert for possible cougars and bears as well. 

we both changed into our swim suits with our backs turned to each other, lol so we did not look at each other. lol  there was a running river near the natural hot spring area which was beautiful. 

there were about 4 pools that were manually structured with rectangular rocks around the natural running hot spring. i took one pool and my friend took the other pool to soak in. 

i still felt the presence of being watched but i did not say anything to my friend. i was enjoying my soak. i do not know how long we were there but i said to my friend, just to let you know i am not watching you. lol 
she started to laugh because she felt the same way and felt like something was watching her.It almost felt like a flash of time went by when we were soaking in the hot springs, because we both said at the same time are you ready to leave?, yeah it's time to leave. so we both got dressed and went to my friends car.   

then we seen another car stop and pull into the same area we were in and we left the same way we came. we seen deer's and i took pictures of the animals on the way out of the mountains. we talked about our experience being there and we chalked it up to being animals and my friend said very weird.

my friend that evening was very sick, she said she had a head ache, was puking and dizzy. we were in a hotel at radium hot springs. i tried to comfort her by giving her water , but she's an independent women so she really did not need my help. if she needed anything i was there to help her. 

i was looking at the pictures i took from the day and just thought of how beautiful of a surrounding we were in and i was in awe from the pics i took at the natural hot spring area. then i noticed something out of place in one of the pic's from there. i noticed a bluish white light on the top of my pic near the top of the tree lines. i thought wtf is that and zoomed in on it. 

i was shocked and i turned to my friend and said her name,  omg!!!!  look what came up in our pics from there!!!! this is what was watching us!!! she went omg! and got sick again. she even said that she is probably sick from the radiation that it could have exposed us to. i agreed.

we did not see anything there physically, but we did feel a strong heavy presence of being watched. to the point of both of us being a bit paranoid. so here are the pics.   
 
if you turn the pic vertical, you can make out the shape of a full size body outline from hear to toe in the middle of the shape. the out line is in the middle of the brightest lighted area. enjoy!

i have before pics of the scenery without the entity and there of course after.
content.summary: Camera shot!

content.detailedDescription:
Went east to west 
around nine pm 
while i was playing cornhole
i have an eye witness 
yellow light and it changed to blue
and disappeared
took less than what seemed like a second but may have been 4 sec.
and no noise 
totally silent
went really far very quickly.... much faster than any plane
totally vanished - not kept going in the sky but vanished
content.summary: Very fast ufo lights go east to west change color then vanish

content.detailedDescription: We noticed a large object hovering over the nuclear power plant that is adjacent to our home across the bay. it was station ary for at least an hour.  completely surrounded by storm clouds that were emitting lighting with no sound. there were no other storm clouds in the sky at the time.  you could clearly see what appeared to be movement in the form of a trail coming from the object down to the plant and vice versa.  after about 15 minutes what appeared to be drone planes started canvassing the area. 30 minutes later the cloud like object appeared to fold into itself and dissipated. while observing this object you could clearly see the clouds rolling over the edges of the object. this whole event made zero noise and also did not move during the course of the hour.
content.summary: Large object at least 3/4 of a mile long. hovering over nuclear power plant.

content.detailedDescription: It was august 8th 2015 10 p.M. me and my two best friends are having a normal day hanging out. we we're sitting down talking like usual and then my friend said he was hearing some weird exploding noises or some type of explosion or firework ( i'd like to add that fireworks are illegal in utah at this time) so he goes to the window and he sees that the explosion they're coming from the distance southwest of us,we could also see flashing lights in the distance where the explosions are coming from. after approximately 5 to 10 minutes of pure loud exploding noise everything went silent so we went back to hanging out and talking then my friend decided to go check out and see if he could still see the lights but when he looked outside he saw some silver/grayish metallic object fly over his house at incredible speeds, he immediately told us to rush to the window so we ran towards the window and pop our heads out and above us i saw 4 disk like metallic objects flying towards the south, they were all in such a precise and organized line. after the ufo sighting me and my friends decided to go outside to see if we can spot any more and this is where it gets strange where we had been hearing the explosions come from, birds and not just a few birds, but thousands of birds were flying  away from that direction. we stayed outside for 2 hours for those whole 2 hours hundreds and hundreds of birds just kept flying away from that direction. we believe the explosions were coming from a secret military base that we actually saw on their way back from my trip to idaho. we did research on this facility because when we had passed it we saw a bunch of officers patrolling the area and whoever would get close to the base would be stopped and questioned. i've never reported ufo sighting for the risk of being laughed at but this was too strange to ignore i had to report it to someone i think the strangest part was when a bunch of airplanes were headed towards the direction where the explosion / lot of noises were coming from. i'm left here without answers what went on that night. thank you mufon for letting me share.
content.summary: We saw 4-6 ufo or gray metallic objects. they were all in a line heading in the same direction at a very high speed one that's never been seen before.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking north on 10th ave taking pictures.

i didn't notice that i had photographed anything until i downloaded my images several hours later at home.

when i first saw them i thought they might have been lights from a helicopter but it wasn't dark enough for the whole body of an aircraft to be obscured. 

whatever it is, looks segmented with gaps between the lights.In one picture you can see a light seemingly ascending in the distance.

i really don't have feelings either way as i've always been a believer in ufo's. always thought that i would see something sooner or later.

as i mentioned, i didn't see these images until i downloaded them.
content.summary: Not  visible through the viewfinder as  i was taking the picture

content.detailedDescription: This is the second night this week i have seen strange craft. they appear to be jets with steadily flashing lights. but if you look directly at them you see the actual outline of them and they are not jets. they seemed to come in many different shapes. some more like structures, one looked like so kind of sea creature, it felt like it turned and looked at me then swam away. they are silent, but they are much lower than the lights would make you believe. i lost count at 12 last night. the previous night was the same way. i got a feeling of peace and love from them, no fear. they are here to help us.
content.summary: I saw many crafts passing over head. they would have appeared to be jets but i could see the outline against the light polluted sky. they looked like organic beings, ships moved like sea creatures swimming. silent. one saw me and looked at me.

content.detailedDescription:
Outside on back porch at approx 9:30pm et. sky was clear, saw bright flashing, twinkling object in southeast sky. i used my skyview augmented reality app to determine if it was a star/satellite/planet etc, but it was not. object was to the left and slightly higher than the star sirius, and slightly larger. my phone battery went dead at this point, so i quickly ran inside to plug it in, and came back outside to continue watching the object. i watched it for about 45 minutes. i then noticed an aircraft in the sky, toward the northeast, it's lights resembled a passenger plane. the object in the sky remained and at comparison, did not resemble a plane.
at this point i went inside and got my slightly charged phone. i began video recording the object for a little over 30 seconds. the object remained for most, then "trailed" out/away, which is in the video. i began recording the video at 10:23pm et.

i have included the entire video, a trained version of the same video, still images from the video, and enhanced stills from the video. i have more stills than can be uploaded below which i would love to include.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flashing light in southeast sky, then trailed out

at this point i went inside and got my slightly charged phone. i began video recording the object for a little over 30 seconds. the object remained for most, then "trailed" out/away, which is in the video. i began recording the video at 10:23pm et.

i have included the entire video, a trained version of the same video, still images from the video, and enhanced stills from the video. i have more stills than can be uploaded below which i would love to include.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flashing light in southeast sky, then trailed out

content.detailedDescription: I took some photos of the backyard. the pool trees. went back in the house and saw.. faces and a craft.. i showed it on face book. and my family think that im crazy.. but if i blow my photo up i see faces and a craft on the uper left.
content.summary: In my photo there is a. craft

content.detailedDescription: I was in malmö, sweden for vacation and i was taking some photos. i didn't see or notice anything at that time (neither did other people around me) but a few days later when i was looking at my photos i noticed something in the sky in one of them.  it was shiny, silverish and spherical, but not a perfect sphere. the bottom part seemed to be a little flatter than the rest of the object. as i looked at the photo more carefully and zoomed in i noticed 5 blurry, very small black-grey dots in the background, but i don't know if they are similar objects since they are too blurry and small. the night after i took the photo, on 5.8.2015, i saw multiple helicopters with red and green lights hovering in the sky at approximatley 10.30 pm-11.30 pm. i don't know if it has anything to do with the objects in my photo, but i didn't see or hear any helicopters the night before. i'm attaching the original photo, and a photo with the objects outlined. i would like to learn the object's approximate size, how high it is floating, and what it could possibly be.
content.summary: Silver, shiny spherical object. i noticed it in a photo i took when i was traveling.

content.detailedDescription: I live in the country in a town called toodyay about 80km from perth in western australia. there is alot of farm land but also areas of thick bush and trees, i live on a  5 acre bush block about 7km from the town center. i have a lot of tall trees (white gums) on my property. i was up late watching a movie and was about to go to bed, it was approximately 11:45pm, when i realised the fire needed another log on it so i went out my back door to get one when i noticed some bright lights in the sky about tree top level on top of the small hill at the back of my property. at first i thought they were a rescue helicopter, they are quite common in the area because it's the quickest way to get to the hospital, but then realised there was absolutely no sound, not even a faint one. i then observed what appeared to be four orb like lights in a line close together and to the left of the object was a smaller orange light a little bit off to the side. the lights were bright, brighter that a star, they reminded me of stadium lights and were kind of emitting a flare off the top and bottom, it was impossible to see any shape to it as the light flare was so great. once i had realised it was nothing i had seen before i quickly stepped back inside and locked the door. i could tell it was close as the tops of the trees were slightly lit up from the lights. i tried to look out another window to get a better look but couldn't see any better, it lingered for about 10mins then slowly, so slowly you could hardly tell it was moving, drifted off out of sight, the last thing i saw was the small orange light which slowly disappeared as i watched it. then nothing. no sound, complete darkness. i was really scared, i was shaking, it felt very eerie, my husband works away 2 weeks at a time so i was by myself with 2 small children and a baby, i actually rang my dad to come and stay with me i was so scared, i was actually too afraid to get in the car and leave. i was hoping that in the morning i would see that it was just something very explainable but when i looked at where i saw it, there is nothing but sky and tree tops. i have thought and thought about what it could have been, i have ruled out car headlights, plane, helicopter, star, drone, i have no idea what it was. i just know it was bright and big and close and i would be quite happy if i never see anything like it again. it terrified me.
content.summary: 4 orb like lights close together in a line, very bright, stationary, treetop level, 1 small orange object to the left, lights slowly moved away, no noise

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 4:30ampt i looked out my window and saw a strange object that appeared to be an small space craft with lights encircling it. the craft hovered and made sharp and fast turns. a white orbe trailed the craft.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A small spacecraft with glowing lights encircling it, shape sifted and was trailed by a white orbe.

content.detailedDescription:
Two friends of mine witnessed 3 very bright lights under the surface of the water at roughly 150 feet depth, 1 km from shore, the lights were moving direction and cast a very long beam, a neighbor went in his boat above the area of the sighting and the lights dimmed down, later becoming brighter after boat left, this continued for roughly 2 hours
 
roughly a year ago, locals here under my employment saw a circular craft emerge from the water and fly off at great speed, this sighting was also made at the same area of devil's point

my friends have no idea what the lights were, there were no boats anywhere, it is a very rough part of the sea, and they were not divers, the lights were intensely bright, casting beams of light for at least 100 feet illuminating colors on the reef
content.summary: In vanuatu off devil's point, 3 lights were observed under water, very bright

content.detailedDescription:
Location: tucson, az. time: 22:05 conditions: clear sky, stars visible.
visibility: 10 miles. i was trying to get back home by the time coast to coast started at 10:06.  we were delayed by watching a bright orange ball in the sky that approached from the nne. there were no navigation lights.  the object appeared to move very slowly then hover.  at first i thought it was a helicopter but, the absence of navigation lights and rotor noise ruled it out.  the object appeared to hover a few times then continued to move. it was not at high altitude and well below the standard flight altitude of commercial and military aircraft over populated areas. 
  i was clearly able to see that at one point it was moving directly toward my position; this is important because it tells me that i did see it hovering and not only appearing to do so while it was actually moving toward me. it then turned to a directly west heading.  it began to pulse and flicker, much like a match or candle about to burn out; it blinked three times and quickly (5 sec.) disappeared in mid air.  it made no noise or crackling/hissing sound as objects do when descending through the atmosphere.  it was a very bright orange, steady and stable colour and intensity until it suddenly went out. it appeared much like a light bulb: steady, consistent brightness without pulsing. i estimate that it was about one to two miles up and within 5 miles of where i stood.  it may have been descending but, it was a very slow descent. it turned dark/faded/disappeared within ten seconds after turning to the west, it was no longer visible after this point.
  i have seen two very distinct unexplainable craft of obvious non-human origin in my lifetime, i have seen a failing russian space rocket reenter the atmosphere and burn up as it descended.  this case was different from both as it was clearly an orange ball of light, not flame or fireball.  the perseid meteor showers are late tonight but, they are not in our atmosphere.  i have seen many, 'falling stars,' meteors, etc.  this is not like anything i've seen before.  i am a longtime sky watcher, amateur astronomer; my best guess is that it was a falling piece of space debris but, it was maintaining altitude and moving so slow that it is difficult for me to believe that it was a meteor, etc. 
  the city of tucson is adjacent to davis-monthan air base, that said, there was nothing about this object that would compel any reasonable person  to believe that it was human made.  if it was descending i was unable to discern that it was doing so.  there were no aircraft visible any where over the city or vicinity at the time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large orange light, not 'fireball'. moving slowly, appeared to slow and hover then slightly change direction, flickered three times disappeared

content.detailedDescription: For the past 3 yrs i,ve been star gazing at night while i smoke a cig .On friday july 31 2015 at between 2:30 & 3:30 am while having a smoke i was looking east at the stars as i finished my smoke i started to turn to the north west in the direction of my house & saw  the largest & brightest white light silently moving at a regular small fixed wing plane,s stall speed or less & at less than 1000 feet.It was moving from nw to se and before it disapperred beyond the horizon the first of at least 7 larger jets followed behind on the same flight path exactly.  my father was a private pilot from when i was 4 & i also went for my private pilot license  i know what plane,jet,helicopter,large & small running lights & or spot lights look like so when i saw this travel directly over my house i had no doubt about what it was,nt so as far as i,m concerned  this was an unknown or if you like a ufo.The next night my wife and son & i saw it again further away & moving north to south it,s definatly left us with some new feelings on such matters & also the night of my first sighting the light was a white like i,ve never seen before with  a dozen sun beam like things jetting out of it. the size of the surcomfronce of the object if compared to a jet flying 20 -30 thousand feet the light was larger than at least 2 jet liners put together the object being at less than a thousand ft if u get my comparison.
content.summary: Largest &brightest light silently moving across the sky 7 air craft folowed every min after

content.detailedDescription: May 5, 2015 just stepped to have a cig. , about 10 after 10:00. looked to the east and was sweeping the sky towards the west. saw a airplane in the east, very normal . as i swept towards the west at southeast up about 10 o-clock high saw a pinpoint flash that grew yellow with red like flames to about 2 1/2 to 3 inches. then it blanked out. the area where it was seemed black - nothing. i stood there going , wow , that was something exploding in the upper atmosphere .  no sound from it that could be heard over cars going by. stood there several minutes still looking at the area . after several minutes i could see stars in the same area , it was like a cloud had moved . i watched the sky for another half hour. nothing else was seem . told my sister and brother-in-law what i saw.  looked on-line for any reports by others, nothing. just feel like i couldn't be the only person to witness this event, what ever it was.  let me know , is this something that can be verified .
content.summary: It was a pinpoint to 2 1/2 in explosion in atmoshere. yellow, with red flame outside as it grew.Only lasted about 3 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
when i first saw them i thought it was 3 helicopters moving in my direction. as i watched them for awhile (3 -5 minutes) and it appeared that the one closest to me was flickering and then a 4th one joined in line. there was 4 total that i saw that had a fireball like appearance. they were larger and closer then the stars you could see on this clear sky night. i walked over to get my wife and ask/show her, but when i returned they where gone. we stood looking trying to figure out what it was. in a short time later a fellow came up asking if i saw the strange lights in the sky. he said this without me saying anything about what i saw. i told i'm i did and he went on to tell my wife and i the same story i just told her. i wish i stayed and watched after he said that 2 went one direction and 2 the other. sadly i missed that. 
  the funny thing is we live near an airport and see many types of aircraft all the time and know it's not unusual to see them lined up. but we are not at home and these weren't plains lining up to land. i'm not sure what it was. but fell strong enough to know thieves 4 lights were different.
content.summary: Ball of fire

content.detailedDescription: 1. standing in my backyard,smoking a cigarette i looked up and saw a very dark square or rectangular shape with maybe a v shaped wing on top . when i first observed the ufo, i watched for a few minutes then went to my garage to get my binoculars , went to the front of the house to look and it was still there,i steadied my self against my car to watch.It was there another 10 mins. then disappeared! it lasted about 20 mins. there were no running lights and the sun was setting around 7:20pm the ufo was below the cloud cover at that time.
content.summary: I saw a dark object at 7:20pm 8-8-2015 over southern sky over phoenix,az that hovered and vanished after aprox.15 mins.

content.detailedDescription: I was headed home and was about to take a right down a street before the cemetery and noticed very odd object very low and a firery like appearance. i continued on down center street in place of turning down hall or hamlin street. upon the intersection near first niagra bank i noticed a second object. it seemed to get brighter and go up and down. it was kind of scary so i called someone to witness this. after picking said person up and returning she was also seeing what i seen. now only one it was very bright and descended and seemed to dim out and disappear.
content.summary: Seen two glowing and pulsating round objects low to ground.  went and got someone to witness and seen same things.
